TopicTitle: I need help with a crash log.

Articles.Content: So, since a few months, I had the problem with KSP crashing after start and freezing my whole PC. Yesterday KSP managed to shut itself down before it happened and left a crash-log behind. Can you help me find out, what the issue is?
Nothing jumps out to me but haven’t scrutinised fully. It’s not an issue with your system though. The player.log might provide more (it provides link in that crash log).
Thanks for looking over it! Here is the player.log

It appears to be some issue with either GPU driver or DirectX install
